;L0-L1 MIS 90-Degree Transition A Top

;added by Tarkus, 11/10/2016
;Type 120 Base
;Tile 05
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x04040102,0x00000200,0x57E10500,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04010204,0x00020000,0x57E10500,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01020404,0x02000000,0x57E10500,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02040401,0x00000002,0x57E10500,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x04040102,0x00000200,0x57E10800,2,1

;###LHD###TYPE3=0x01020404,0x02000000,0x57E10800,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02040401,0x00000002,0x57E10800,3,1
